Powered by the Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA), Cisco Secure Remote Access is a single-platform solution that helps protect company resources while granting customized, secure access to individuals based on roles. Benefits include:
  • Web-based access without preinstalled desktop software
  • Threat-protected VPN access that integrates network and endpoint security in the Cisco Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) VPN platform
  • Simple, flexible, cost-effective licensing that scales as network needs change
  • Supports both IP Security (IPsec) and SSL connectivity from a single platform
  • Supports unified management of remote-access and site-to-site VPN services to help reduce costs and management complexity

Through VPN, delivers reliable transport for complex mission-critical traffic without compromising communications quality. Cisco's site-to-site VPN solutions integrate advanced network intelligence and routing for network designs ranging from traditional hub-and-spoke to "any-to-any" intersite connectivity. Support for Cisco Site-to-Site Access includes:
  • IPsec VPN
  • Easy VPN
  • Dynamic Multipoint VPN
  • Group Encrypted Transport VPN
